RunIf.message: These tests run only when external log option is enabled.

Test.Name: MountExternalLogs
Test.Description: Mount the device with external log enabled.
Test.Code: Fail( mount( DeviceName, MountPoint, FileSystem, 0, 0) == -1, "Mount failed.");

Test.Name: lmLogInitFail1
Test.Description: Fail lmLogInit because of wrong magic number.

Test.Name: lmLogInitFail2
Test.Description: Fail lmLogInit because of bad state.

Test.Name: lmLogInitFail3
Test.Description: Fail lmLogInit because of wrong UUID.
